subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4203 is on the way
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

I received a notification today regarding the delivery of my order. However, only the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor was delivered, while the Simsonn Plus X Pedals were not included. Will these be shipped in a separate package, or has part of my order gone missing?

I hope you can assist me with this matter. Thank you very much, and have a great day.

Best regards,
Patrick Mazugo

________________________________
From: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 3, 2025 8:24:46 AM
To: remixx-@hotmail.de <remixx-@hotmail.de>
Subject: A shipment from order #SSN4203 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrick M.,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock. We will ship your order immediately using alternative logistics and ensure you avoid customs duties.

Hello Simsonn Team,

?Thank you for the quick response.
It would have been helpful to receive this information during the ordering process, especially since I paid extra for faster shipping.
?Nevertheless, thank you for the update. Have a great day.

?Best regards,
Patrick

________________________________
Hi Patrick M.,  We apologize for the delay; the warehouse in Germany is temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.
